description: Get a list of favorite videos for a user

response_fields.name: is_recently_updated
response_fields.description: Boolean. True when resource was updated

requests.curl:
curl "www.beta-malimartv.elasticbeanstalk.com/favorite_videos?user=1" -X GET \
	-H "Api-Version: v1" \
	-H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJ3d3cuYmV0YS1tYWxpbWFydHYuZWxhc3RpY2JlYW5zdGFsay5jb20iLCJpYXQiOjE1OTE1Njc2NzYuMjE2OTI1LCJ1c2VyIjp7ImlkIjoxLCJsb2dpbiI6ImRvY3RvcjcxLndob0BleGFtcGxlLmNvbSIsImVtYWlsIjoiZG9jdG9yNzEud2hvQGV4YW1wbGUuY29tIiwib3JpZ2luIjoibG9jYWwiLCJwcmVtaXVtIjpmYWxzZX0sImV4cCI6MTU5MTY1NDA3Nn0.NeIRSg6eZgoA4oJoeY6dvYFvrz8BCWLy8_v9XL_EAl5saRpW5QQfa9GpJJQz9GrMdncasgUelvcfYhzusuBpQg"
